meanings.definition: Hepcats: fashionable or stylish people, especially jazz enthusiasts
meanings.sent1: The hepcats at the party were dressed in trendy clothes and danced gracefully to the jazz music.
meanings.sent2: The hepcats in the jazz club always know the latest fashion trends and enjoy discussing different jazz artists.
meanings.sent3: The hepcats decided to have a fashion show featuring only jazz-inspired outfits.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd like a hepcat in a sea of ordinary cats.
meanings.sent5: The hepcats' sense of style was as smooth as the jazz melodies they loved.

meanings.definition: Hepcats: a group of people who are knowledgeable or enthusiastic about jazz music
meanings.sent1: The hepcats gathered every weekend to listen to jazz records and share their favorite musicians.
meanings.sent2: In the jazz festival, the hepcats could be seen discussing the history of different jazz genres.
meanings.sent3: The hepcats organized a jazz trivia night to test their knowledge and have fun together.
meanings.sent4: Their passion for jazz made them a group of hepcats who could hear the music in the wind.
meanings.sent5: Among the hepcats, his knowledge of jazz was as deep as the ocean.
